function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variation in air change rate due to window opening width and location.","Impact":"Inaccurate understanding of ventilation patterns may lead to poor indoor air quality and increased risk of contagious disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough ventilation analysis to understand the impact of window opening width and location on air change rate.","Technologies":"Airflow modeling software, indoor air quality monitors.","People":"Occupants of the building, especially in densely populated areas where contagious diseases can spread easily.","Owner":"Building managers, ventilation specialists."}]}
